example.text: The GOP's #DefaultonAmerica Act would be disastrous for our country. Their extreme bill cuts veterans' services, strips health care from millions, & hinders our economic growth. This is what they have to show after holding our economy hostage for months? It's reckless & cruel.

Dr. Geeta Gupta spent her career empowering women worldwide. I'm glad the Senate has finally confirmed her to serve as Ambassador-at-large for Global Women’s Issues so she can continue her work improving women's economic security and combatting violence against women and girls.

Federal Communications Commission (FCC)- Affordable Connectivity Outreach Grant Program - Pilot Program Grants CFDA Number 32.011 provides new federal funding for the FCC to grant eligible governmental entities and third-party organizations with the funding and resources needed to increase awareness of and participation in the ACP among those households most in need of affordable connectivity. (January 9, 2023 deadline) Department of Interior- Fish and Wildlife Service National Fish Passage Program Bipartisan Infrastructure Law Fiscal Year 2023 and Fish and Wildlife Service F23AS00100 Refuges Enhancement/ Infrastructure CFDA Numbers 15.685 are two programs to maintain or increase fish populations to improve ecosystem resiliency and provide quality fishing experiences for the American people.
